Rule.Name: PartialArrayContains
Rule.Title: [CDATA["Query uses ARRAY_CONTAINS with partial matching."]]
Rule.Description: [CDATA["Instead of using ARRAY_CONTAINS with partial matching, consider using EXISTS with a subquery. "]]

Rule.Name: Contains
Rule.Title: [CDATA["Query uses CONTAINS."]]
Rule.Description: [CDATA["If you are matching on a string prefix, consider using STARTSWITH."]]

Rule.Name: CaseInsensitiveStartsWithOrStringEquals
Rule.Title: [CDATA["Query uses case-insensitive string search functions STARTSWITH or StringEquals."]]
Rule.Description: [CDATA["Instead of a case-insensitive string search, consider defining a computed property that converts the string to lowercase."]]

Rule.Name: CaseInsensitiveEndsWith
Rule.Title: [CDATA["Query uses ENDSWITH."]]
Rule.Description: [CDATA["Instead of using ENDSWITH, consider defining a computed property that reverses the string and using STARTSWITH in the query for comparison."]]

Rule.Name: UpperLowerComparison
Rule.Title: [CDATA["Query uses UPPER or LOWER in the WHERE clause."]]
Rule.Description: [CDATA["Consider defining a computed property on the UPPER/LOWER function expression."]]

Rule.Name: GetCurrentDateTime
Rule.Title: [CDATA["GetCurrentDateTime in the WHERE clause."]]
Rule.Description: [CDATA["Consider using GetCurrentDateTimeStatic instead of GetCurrentDateTime in the WHERE clause."]]

Rule.Name: GetCurrentTicks
Rule.Title: [CDATA["GetCurrentTicks in the WHERE clause."]]
Rule.Description: [CDATA["Consider using GetCurrentTicksStatic instead of GetCurrentTicks in the WHERE clause."]]

Rule.Name: GetCurrentTimestamp
